Jessie Ware interview: ‘We are living a dystopian nightmare’

The ‘Say You Love Me’ singer’s podcast ‘Table Manners’ has won her millions of listeners, and her new album is a dazzling return to form. She talks to Kate Hutchinson about her mum Lennie, Black Lives Matter, being an ‘underdog’ and believing in herself

Meet Che Lingo, the London rapper confronting police brutality

Link: /arts-entertainment/music/features/che-lingo-interview-police-brutality-uk-julian-cole-black-lives-matter-my-block-lyrics-a9574321.html

His song ‘My Block’, written after his friend Julian Cole’s life was ruined by four officers, has become an unofficial anthem of London’s Black Lives Matter protests. It’s time for justice, he tells Chanté Joseph
